comment: * A UNIX-domain (AF_UNIX / AF_LOCAL) socket address. * * See unix(7). * * @see OsConstants#AF_UNIX * * @hide

variables.name: sun_path
variables.comment: Note that the array referenced by this field can be modified from JNI (libcore_io_Linux.cpp).

methods.name: public static UnixSocketAddress createAbstract(String name)
methods.comment:
* Creates a named, abstract AF_UNIX socket address.
     *
     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code name} is null
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code name} is invalid, e.g. too long
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public static UnixSocketAddress createFileSystem(String pathName)
methods.comment: * Creates a named, filesystem {@link OsConstants#AF_UNIX} socket address. * * See unix(7). * * @param pathname filename for named unix socket * @throws NullPointerException if {@code name} is {@code null} * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code name} is invalid, e.g. too long * * @hide

methods.name: public static UnixSocketAddress createUnnamed()
methods.comment:
* Creates an unnamed, filesystem AF_UNIX socket address.
     *
     * @hide
